body_html:
I encountered with this problem, too.
Thank you for your post, or I think it will take me a lot of time to find the reason of this error.

But now I still wonder what the simplest way is for me to use both peephole and orthogonal initializer, cuz peephole is the most popular variant of LSTM.

body:
I encountered with this problem, too. 
Thank you for your post, or I think it will take me a lot of time to find the reason of this error.

But now I still wonder what the simplest way is for me to use both peephole and orthogonal initializer, cuz peephole is the most popular variant of LSTM.
